label: Full status

label: Full status (alt)
description: A large <color_yellow>health graph</color>, complete with <color_yellow>health</color> & <color_yellow>wetness meters</color> for all major body parts, <color_yellow>body graphs</color> for status, encumbrance & temperature, and all of the <color_yellow>character stats</color>.
